mapper.insert:
insert into ad_staff (sid, name, state, email, phone, depid, depname, duty, oldduty, dn, olddn, date, time, creater ,modifier) values
(#{item.sid}, #{item.name}, #{item.state}, #{item.email}, #{item.phone}, #{item.depid}, #{item.depname}, #{item.duty}, #{item.oldduty}, #{item.dn}, #{item.olddn}, #{item.date}, #{item.time}, #{item.creater}, #{item.modifier})
